title: The impact of single and combined amendment of elemental sulphur and graphene oxide on soil microbiome and nutrient transformation activities
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Tereza Hammerschmiedt, Jiri Holatko, Zuzana Bytesnikova, Petr Skarpa, Lukas Richtera, Antonin Kintl, Jana Pekarkova, Jiri Kucerik, Iwona Jaskulska, Maja Radziemska, Radmila Valova, Ondrej Malicek, Martin Brtnicky
